attributes.review: You’d think because of the AmAZiNg things he’s done in the past he can make a decent app. Smh.

This is the worst app ever Glitches way too much The response on the app takes forever Donald Trump is a white supremacist and I do not support him all of the merchandise is trash and overpriced

attributes.review: I stumbled upon this app and thought I would download, and boy was I wrong for that. It turns out this app is about a racist Cheeto man!!! 😳😳😳😳 Never again will I get on this app🤢
attributes.title: Waste of an app 😡

attributes.review: Why does the big Cheeto need my phone number! Thats unnecessary! Why does he need it! I DONT UNDERSTAND! When I opened the app it showed me a terrifying photo. My eyes hurt now😢. 1 star ⭐️ It’s a scam, it killed my fish.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: When I first logged in I clicked do not send me notifications but it lied to me and still sent me notifications. Not surprising it lies as it is Donald trumps app
attributes.title: Sends me notifications!!!!! 😡😡😡😡

attributes.review: I had to restart my phone after getting the app. It was buggin. I highly recommend getting a different app. This one ain’t it.
attributes.title: I-

attributes.review: So this app promised my crab if he downloaded this app he would get free health care . ITS ALL A LIE DON’T LET YOUR PETS DOWNLOAD THIS APP . I also heard from a little birdie that trump is trying to ban tiktok from the US . THAT WON’T AND WILL NEVER HAPPENED UNTILLTHE TOXICITY ON TIKTOK REACHES IT’S BREAKING POINT. UNTILL THEN THIS APP WILL STAND LOUD AND PROUD ❤️✨😌.
attributes.title: BAD NEWS!! DON’T GET THIS APP . IT’S A WASTE

attributes.review: I got on the app and it would not let me in because I am NOT A TRUMP 🤮supporter and I don’t even know why they even have this stupid app  doing this to try to not band tik tok  R.I.P tik tok

attributes.review: The glitches were so bad the app would never stay open. Then my giraffes ate a corona beer. Built a wall. Deleted the clock and ran into the sunset.
